contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {|{{Infobox Ship Begin}} {{Infobox Ship Image |Ship image= |Ship caption= }} {{Infobox Ship Career |Hide header= |Ship country=UK |Ship flag=[[Image:British-Royal-Fleet-Auxiliary-Ensign.svg|60px|RFA Ensign]] |Ship name=RFA ''Nasprite'' |Ship namesake= |Ship ordered=9 October 1939 |Ship builder= |Ship laid down=7 March 1940 |Ship launched=28 November 1940 |Ship acquired= |Ship completed= |Ship commissioned=11 February 1941 |Ship decommissioned=31 August 1954 |Ship in service= |Ship out of service= |Ship struck= |Ship reinstated= |Ship honours= |Ship fate=Arrived at [[Amsterdam]] for scrapping at [[Willebroek]] on 5 February 1964 |Ship status= |Ship notes= }} {{Infobox Ship Characteristics |Hide header= |Header caption= |Ship class=[[Sprite class tanker|Sprite-class]] [[oil tanker|tanker]] |Ship tonnage= |Ship displacement=1,900 [[tonne]]s full load |Ship length={{Convert|214|ft|m|2|abbr=on}} |Ship beam={{Convert|33|ft|2|in|m|2|abbr=on}} |Ship draught={{Convert|12|ft|9.75|in|m|2|abbr=on}} |Ship propulsion=3 cyl triple expansion steam. 162 nhp. One shaft. |Ship speed={{Convert|10|kn|km/h}} |Ship range= |Ship complement= |Ship sensors= |Ship EW= |Ship armament= |Ship armour= |Ship aircraft= |Ship aircraft facilities= |Ship notes= }} |} '''RFA ''Nasprite'' (A252)''' was a [[Sprite class tanker|Sprite-class]] [[oil tanker|tanker]] of the [[Royal Fleet Auxiliary]]. She served during the [[Second World War]]. She was laid up in reserve at [[HMNB Devonport|Devonport]] on 31 August 1954, and put up for disposal in August 1963. {{Sprite class tanker}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Nasprite}} [[Category:Sprite-class tankers]] [[Category:Tankers of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary]] [[Category:1940 ships]] {{UK-aux-ship-stub}}
